sourcesContent:
Shoe Name Price Brand Edit Delete

Edit Modal

import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fetch-data', templateUrl: './fetch-data.component.html' }) export class FetchDataComponent { readonly APIUrl = 'https://localhost:7252/WeatherForecast' constructor(private http: HttpClient) { this.getItems(); } public items: items[] = []; getItems() { this.http.get(this.APIUrl).subscribe({ next: (value) => { this.items = value; }, error: (err) => { console.log(err); }, }); } public editedShoe: items = { SName: '', SPrice: 0, SDescription: '', }; openEditModal(event: any, item: any) { this.editedShoe = { ...item }; // Clone the item to editedShoe } updating() { this.http.put(`${this.APIUrl}?SName={this.item.SName}`, this.editedShoe).subscribe({ next: () => { console.log(`Updated by Shoename: ${this.editedShoe.SName}`); this.getItems() }, error: (err) => { console.log(err); }, }) } deleteShoe(SName: string) { this.http.delete(`${this.APIUrl}?SName=${SName}`).subscribe({ next: () => { console.log(`Deleted by Shoename: ${SName}`); this.getItems() }, error: (err) => { console.log(err); }, }) } } interface items { SName: string; SPrice: number; SDescription: string; }
